field.name: description
field.value:
DP 2's Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.SimpleAST.LoadArrayElementExpression generates invalid code: the OpCodes.Ldelem opcode needs a type token, currently it is emitted without a parameter.
Suggested resolution: add a Type field to the expression and use it when emitting the code. I'm attaching a patch.
Note: This only affects people who use DynamicProxy as a code generation library, DP 2's proxy generators don't use LoadArrayElementExpression.
